name: Trillionaire (Pat Healy)
description:
Trillionaire is a game about the incredible power of $1 Trillion. It's a sort of spiritual successor to Kris Ligman's You Are Jeff Bezos, though without its clever writing and with a whole lot more buttons.

If you have thoughts on new purchasable items I should add to the game, throw them into this form. I might add them in an update!
